name: [Measurement sensors] gravEnabled - gyroEnabled - accEnabled - rotationEnabled - movementDetectionEnabled
description:
These properties affects the measurement sensors

- `gravEnabled`: When enabled and supported by the device, the measurement result will contain gravitational data.
- `gyroEnabled`: When enabled and supported by the device, the measurement result will contain gyroscope data.
- `accEnabled`: When enabled and supported by the device, the measurement result will contain accelerometer data.
- `rotationEnabled`: When enabled and supported by the device, the measurement result will contain rotational data.
- `movementDetectionEnabled`: When enabled the `onMovementDetected` event will be thrown when movement is detected.The detection will trigger when the movement vector is lower than 6 or higher than 14.
